title: Kanye West predicts he will be US President and asked album collaborators to abstain from sex
text:
Kanye West has made some bold claims including that he predicts that he will be US President in an explosive new interview.

The 42-year-old rapper sat down for an exclusive two-hour interview with Zane Lowe for Apple Beats 1 radio which was released on Thursday.

Other than his want to become the leader of the free world he made several other brazen statements including that he asked people collaborating to abstain from sex, he kicked an addiction to porn, and that there shouldn't be NSFW content available to kids on social media.

Interesting: Kanye West has made some bold claims including that he predicts that he will be US President in an explosive interview with Zane Lowe for Apple Beats 1 radio released Thursday

Moving on: The rapper was seen out and about in New York City on Thursday

The interview took place in Wyoming as Kanye said that he is working on the framework of a presidential run possibly in 2024.

The husband of Kim Kardashian said when he wins the election: 'I will remember ... any founder that didn't have the capacity to understand culturally what we're doing.'

It remains unclear what founders he was referring to but he did mention Facebook and Twitter bosses, Mark Zuckerberg and Jack Dorsey.

Kanye famously had a meeting with President Donald Trump at the Oval Office in October of last year.

Keeping it simple: He sported a bright blue hoodie with indigo washed jeans and a pair of his Adidas Yeezy 500 sneakers in blue

Lots to unpack: In his latest interview, Kanye made several other brazen statements including that he asked people collaborating to abstain from sex, he kicked an addiction to porn, and that there shouldn't be NSFW content available to kids on social media

Friendly to fans: He did not hesitate to sign autographs for a few of his followers

He also met Donald Trump at Trump Tower in New York City back in December 2016 while he was president elect.

He wasn't done there as he called himself 'undoubtedly the greatest human artist of all time' before going into more detail about his controversial past with Trump.

West explained: 'For the greatest artist in human existence to put a red hat on was God’s practical joke to all liberals. Like, 'No! Not Kanye!"'

He later shed even more light on his political leanings as he said he is 'the most liberal.'

Interesting: Kanye said that he is working on the framework of a presidential run possibly in 2024, he is pictured in the Oval Office back in October 2018

Eyebrow raising: The husband of Kim Kardashian - pictured with current US President Donald Trump - said when he wins the election: 'I will remember ... any founder that didn't have the capacity to understand culturally what we're doing'

Where it began: Kanye famously met Donald Trump at Trump Tower in December 2016 while he was president elect

West also said that he used to be addicted to pornography before recently quitting the habit. Just last year he served as co-creative director for the PornHub Awards.

The Hell Of A Life hitmaker explained: 'Playboy was my gateway into full-on pornography addiction. My dad had a Playboy left out at age five, and it’s affected almost every choice I made for the rest of my life from age five to now, having to kick the habit.'

Kanye's strive to be pure even drove him to request that those who collaborated on upcoming album Jesus Is King also do the same.

He said: 'I was asking people to... this is gonna be radical what I’m about to say.

'I was asking people to not have premarital sex': Kanye's strive to be pure even drove him to request that those who collaborated on upcoming album Jesus Is King also do the same

'There were times where I was asking people to not have premarital sex while they were working.

'I know that’s one where The Shade Room gonna be like, "what you mean don’t have premarital sex? you better turn that Meg The Stallion on right now." But seriously there’s times where I went to people that were working on other projects and said 'could you just work and focus on this?'

Kanye also revealed he attempted to bury the hatchet with Drake, and even left his phone number at the rapper's house.

Loved up: Kanye pictured with wife Kim Kardashian at the Met Gala in New York City back in May

'I walk over to Drake's house with no security and leave my phone number, like, "Here's my phone number." I'm not trying to ring the door bell, he might be busy. He got a studio in there, just think he recording at all times,'

He also revealed that checking himself into the hospital for 'psychiatric emergency' back in 2016 led him to Christianity.

West explained: 'Now that I’m in service to Christ, my job is to spread the gospel, to let people know what Jesus has done for me.

And the crowd goes wild: Kanye pictured at his album and filming experience at The Forum in Inglewood on Wednesday night

'I’ve spread a lot of things. There was a time I was letting you know what high fashion had done for me, I was letting you know what the Hennessey had done for me, but now I’m letting you know what Jesus has done for me, and in that I’m no longer a slave, I’m a son now, a son of God. I’m free. The most space that I had to think is when I went to the hospital.'

Somehow lost in the shuffle is that Kanye announced that a new album titled Jesus Is Born will be released on Christmas Day before Jesus Is King has even been put out.

He said: 'Sunday Service album, Jesus is Born, on Christmas is coming.'

Kanye West's ninth studio album, Jesus Is King, along with the documentary of the same name are set for release tomorrow.
description: The 42-year-old rapper sat down for an exclusive interview with Zane Lowe for Apple Beats 1 radio which was released on Thursday.
